title: sans with nice R
content:
Can you ID the sans font on this image? Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/35797d75f41e5f7210f55ad0a84e257f_4044.jpg)

Font: 

 troia bold 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180107/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [35797d75f41e5f7210f55ad0a84e257f.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180107/http:/typophile.com/files/35797d75f41e5f7210f55ad0a84e257f.jpg) | 65.92 KB |
author: slokai

comments.content:
It looks like **[Troia Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ahmet-altun/troia/)** by Ahmet Altun [2013] - probably the Rounded Bold version.  
(The ampersand is taken from another font)
It's troia bold for sure. Thank you very much fvilnakis!
